content: अतिमुक्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Entirely free from worldly desires, finally emancipated. {@--2@} Barren, seedless. {@--3@} Surpassing (a necklace of) pearls; अतिमुक्तमद्ग्रथितकेसरावली <ls>Māl. 5. 8.</ls> --क्तः --क्तकः {@--1@} A kind of creeper (माधवी, <ab>Mar.</ab> कुसरी or कस्तुरमोगरा) represented as twisting itself round the mangotree and as the beloved of that tree; <ab>cf.</ab> क इदानीं सहकारमंतरेणातिमुक्तलतां पल्लवितां सहते <ls>Ś. 3</ls>, परिगृहाण गते सहकारतां त्वमतिमुक्तलताचरितं मयि <ls>M. 4. 13.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree, Dalbergia Oujeinensis (तिनिश). {@--3@} (°क्तकः) Mountain ebony; <ab>N.</ab> of a tree called हरिमंथ (तिंदुकवृक्ष, तालवृक्ष also).
